title: Ultimate Porter ~The Weakest Man Aspires to be an Adventurer~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adventurers   Crafting   Dungeons   Game Elements   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Salaryman   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Nagano Bunzaburou   長野文三郎
description: Miyata Ippei’s status when thrown into another world was just terrible. He only has 8 points in his HP while his Attack and Defense is 3 and 5 points respectively. He can't use any attack magic and if he engaged in a fight then the instant death status is sure to be unavoidable. His recovery magic and crafting skills, however, were prominent. This is the man who aspires to be an adventurer more than anyone.>
